txt.en: 'Do you remember the ruse we performed here for the Heirs of Castamir?'
'I am pleased we were able to fool the Heirs of Castamir with our deception.'
'I spoke with Cuguril again. She says the Armour of the Usurper remains untouched.'
'The guards of the port city remain watchful, as they should and as they must.'
